name: sitepack
description: A framework for building lazymorphic applications.

scripts.build:umd: webpack src/index.js dist/sitepack.js --display-modules --progress && NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js dist/sitepack.min.js --display-modules --progress
scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:umd
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build

author: Jas Chen
